City Boards & Commissions
=========================

* Place 1 - Larry Doyle
* Place 2 - Thomas Jung III
* Chairman - Tony Dauphinot
* Place 4 - Errin Anderson
* Place 5 - Bob Bialas
* Place 6 - Mel Washington
* Liaison - Derek Sutter

* Place 1 - Rob King
* Place 2 - Sheri Joblin
* Place 3 - Richard Quevedo
* Chairman - Gary Hase
* Place 5 - David Halbaedier
* Liaison - Derek Sutter

* Place 1 - Joel Carranza
* Place 2 - Frances Flinn
* Place 3 - VACANT
* Garden Club Rep. - Wanda Hill
* Place 4 - Dorothy Watson
* Place 5 - Ronald Hand
* Place 6 - VACANT
* Place 7 - VACANT
* Liaison - Ray Beamer

* Member - Mae Nix
* Member - Don Dagnell
* Member - Felecia Badger
* Chairman - Ray Lewis

If you're interested in contributing to the growth and development of your community, consider applying to the Boards and Commissions for Planning and Zoning, Board of Adjustment, and Park and Recreational Board. These vital roles play a crucial part in shaping the future of our city. By clicking the picture, you can access more information on how to apply and become an active participant in decisions that will positively impact the landscape, infrastructure, and recreational spaces of our town. Join us in making a difference today!
